And they landed in Cass Corridor in Chinatown.  And so then, of course, he brings over his, like, seven siblings.  And now my dad's side was all here, but they're all Toisan.

My grandfather said, well, I try laundry, but when the business is slow, I have nothing to eat.  But at least if I worked in a restaurant when business is slow, I still have all these food I can eat.  I won't go hungry.
